channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped and immovable, 1st January
item.description:
Over a month this car is dangerously raised up on 3 wheels and has not been moved

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Montcalm Road, Charlton

item.description:

item.title: Dead cat outside building, 1st January
item.description:
There is a dead cat outside the building I work in and other cats and animals are using the dead cat. Please remove it as it doesn’t look pleasant. You must go through the alleyway of 35 Astbury Road se15 2NL to see it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dayton Grove, Nunhead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: More fly tipping and overflowing bins, 1st January
item.description:
There has been more fly tipping (mattress, cardboard boxes, general waste) between Raebarn Court and the dental surgery, opposite Gracefield Gardens Health Centre. This is a constant problem and rubbish is now strewn across the road. It includes food waste and is actively attracting vermin.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2-8, Gracefield Gardens, Streatham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dog Foul Constantly on Sidewalk, 1st January
item.description:
Oriel road, Homerton, is constantly littered with large dog foul. The issue has been very evident for at least 6-8 months. Most recently directly in front of my back entryway. Most often close to the back entrances from 121-131 Hassett road. Please help!

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hassett Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abounded ,Unattended vehicle with No Venice Registration Mark, 1st January
item.description:
Abounded vehicle left unattended and parked on pavement, causing hazard for pedestrians and wheelchairs users and baby buggy users. No vehicle registration Mark on the vehicle .trailer attached to vehicle and blocking whole pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Nursery, North End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rectory Place - Road requires some TLC, 1st January
item.description:
Requires a litter pick / street clean please as well as collection of rotting leaves. Lots of litter incl. rotting newspapers, crisps packets, plastic bags and other paraphernalia. Could you please dedicate a litter pick session to this area as this is an eye sore and people see this all day every day. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Charles Grinling Walk, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Please fill grit bin on North View, 1st January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, North View Road, Hornsey, Greater London
